caption: nhl.com
description: Currently battling lymphoma, eight-year-old Brandon Bloom got the chance to be an Islander for a day.
message: “He’s way stronger than we are, he battles for his life… Just the smile on his face was worth everything today.”
name: New York Islanders

message:
An Islander for the day, but forever a part of our hockey family. 💙  

Keep fighting, Brandon! It was our honor to help make your dreams come true today.
name: New York Islanders

message:
Proud to partner with The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society to make Brandon's dreams come true today. 

Learn how you can help support the cause→lls.org/
name: New York Islanders

message:
“He loves it. I can see the smile across the ice on his face. I know he’ll never forget it.”

Special day for Brandon & the Bloom family. Brandon is battling cancer and today he's fulfilling his dream. 🏒💙
name: New York Islanders

message:
Welcoming the newest member of the Islanders to the ice!

Thrilled to have you Brandon. An inspiration to our team! 🤜🤛  #HockeyWithAHeart
name: New York Islanders
